segments.text: My gaze drifts from the oblivious woman to the other side of the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see two children engaged in what looks like a clandestine operation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A boy is attempting to reach into an open cabinet for a cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's standing on a two-step stool, which looks incredibly wobbly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The legs of that stool are splayed out, making it seem ready to tip backward any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: My heart almost stops as he stretches even further, almost losing his balance.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's got one hand in the "COOKIE JAR" and the other holding a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What a clever little rascal, trying to catch the cookies!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl standing nearby has her hand out, clearly waiting for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They are so focused on their sweet prize, oblivious to their own danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope that stool holds up, or there will be a big crash.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a classic scene of childhood mischief unfolding before my eyes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They are so determined to get those cookies, it's almost admirable.
segments.speaker: PAR
